problem.Problem: 用户认为“去除背景”的效果不好。

history: Enhance Algorithm Accuracy: Improve the background removal algorithm to better detect edges and handle complex images, reducing artifacts and misinterpretations.
startingPoint.content: Enhance Algorithm Accuracy: Improve the background removal algorithm to better detect edges and handle complex images, reducing artifacts and misinterpretations.

Criterion_1.Reason: Enhancing an algorithm involves significant integration and testing, requiring considerable resources.

Criterion_2.Reason: Achievable with current technology, but involves complexities related to algorithm training and testing.

Criterion_3.Reason: Significantly reduces user frustration by improving accuracy, thus enhancing user experience.

Criterion_4.Reason: Directly addresses the core issue of poor edge detection and artifacts, effectively resolving the reported problem.

history: User Control Enhancement: Introduce manual adjustment tools allowing users to refine the automatic background removal, such as adding or subtracting areas from the selection.
startingPoint.content: User Control Enhancement: Introduce manual adjustment tools allowing users to refine the automatic background removal, such as adding or subtracting areas from the selection.

Criterion_1.Reason: Introducing new tools involves moderate development efforts for UI and functional integration.

Criterion_2.Reason: Adding manual controls is a common feature in image editing tools, making implementation straightforward with minor hurdles.

Criterion_3.Reason: Provides noticeable improvement by empowering users, though its effectiveness depends on user skill.

Criterion_4.Reason: Appropriately addresses user needs for more control, directly solving issues of dissatisfaction with automated results.

history: Visual Feedback and Guidance: Provide real-time visual feedback during the background removal process and offer tutorials or tips on achieving the best results, enhancing user understanding and satisfaction with the tool.
startingPoint.content: Visual Feedback and Guidance: Provide real-time visual feedback during the background removal process and offer tutorials or tips on achieving the best results, enhancing user understanding and satisfaction with the tool.

Criterion_1.Reason: Developing real-time feedback and creating educational content require moderate effort and resource allocation.

Criterion_2.Reason: Practical to implement as it leverages existing system capabilities and user interface components.

Criterion_3.Reason: Greatly enhances user experience by reducing confusion and increasing confidence in using the tool.

Criterion_4.Reason: Directly improves user understanding and satisfaction, fully addressing issues related to user expectations and tool performance.
